items.title: iOS 26.1 Beta 2 中的所有新功能 (原标题: Everything New in iOS 26.1 Beta 2)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26.1 Beta 2 中的所有新功能

Apple 发布了 iOS 26.1 和 iPadOS 26.1 的第二个测试版，引入了闹钟、iPad 多任务处理等方面的实用改进，并对 Liquid Glass 设计元素进行了细微调整，以继续完善 iOS 26。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### 闹钟和计时器

*   **滑动停止功能：** 通过“时钟”应用设置的闹钟，在锁定屏幕上现在显示“滑动停止”按钮，取代了之前的“轻点停止”按钮。
*   **贪睡功能：** 用户仍可通过轻点来贪睡闹钟。
*   **防止误触：** 这一改变使得在尝试贪睡时更难意外关闭闹钟。
*   **计时器应用：** “滑动停止”功能也适用于计时器。

![iOS 26.1 滑动停止](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JjK3uoWLl9BJuErwKxwehRzIjzw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-slide-to-stop.jpg?lossy)

### 后台安全改进

*   **自动安全更新：** “设置”应用的“隐私与安全”部分新增了一个开关，用于自动下载和安装安全改进。
*   **快速安全响应升级：** 这是对之前“快速安全响应”功能的改进。

![iOS 26.1 安全改进](https://images.macrumors.com/t/N2DUTGSg62pDDXWyp-A9WSjT7WE=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-security-improvements.jpg?lossy)

### 健身应用

*   **自定义锻炼：** iPhone 上的“健身”应用现在允许用户创建自定义锻炼。
*   **可配置选项：** 用户可以选择锻炼类型、预估的活动卡路里、强度、持续时间以及开始时间。

![iOS 26.1 自定义锻炼](https://images.macrumors.com/t/s3Tk9P-7n0vPEyA6y7czqYPBpBo=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-custom-workout.jpg?lossy)

### 设置应用界面调整

*   **文本左对齐：** “设置”应用中，所有带有文本标题的设置项（如“通用”、“蓝牙”、“Wi-Fi”、“蜂窝网络”、“个人热点”、“辅助功能”等）现在都将文本左对齐，而非居中对齐。

![iOS 26.1 设置左对齐](https://images.macrumors.com/t/iv55lXc9QvRxHGv7hCvNOXHdXF8=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-left-aligned-settings.jpg?lossy)

### 显示设置

*   **新壁纸：** “设置”应用的“显示”部分现在显示 iOS 26 主题的壁纸，取代了之前的 iOS 18 壁纸。

![显示亮度设置 iOS 26.1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/gfg6hLycplDIYMyJ_yiRecFQ2Bw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/display-brightness-setting-ios-26-1.jpg?lossy)

### 主屏幕文件夹

*   **文件夹名称对齐：** 当用户点击进入主屏幕上的文件夹时，顶部的文件夹名称现在是左对齐，而非居中对齐。

![iOS 26.1 文件夹对齐](https://images.macrumors.com/t/axOjqOqH0LgafqNOadi6a5X8dww=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-folder-alignment.jpg?lossy)

### iPadOS 26.1 Slide Over

*   **功能回归：** iPadOS 26.1 Beta 2 重新引入了 Slide Over 功能。
*   **多任务协同：** Slide Over 可与基于窗口的 iPadOS 26 多任务功能并行工作，允许用户在打开多个窗口的同时，通过滑动快速访问 Slide Over 应用。
*   **限制：** iPadOS 26.1 中一次只能有一个 Slide Over 应用。
*   **启用方式：** 通过点击绿色的窗口调整按钮并切换“进入 Slide Over”来使用此功能。

![iPadOS 26.1 Slide Over](https://images.macrumors.com/t/81VOK8kMc_rZGvoseq4jpcJv7Aw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ipados-26-1-slide-over.jpg?lossy)

### iPad 上的外接麦克风

*   **输入增益调节：** 在 iPad 上使用外接麦克风时，现在可以调节输入增益。

### Liquid Glass 设计

*   **效果更微妙：** 应用周围的光线折射效果在深色图标和背景颜色下变得更加微妙。

### 壁纸设置

*   **提示信息优化：** 在锁定屏幕上设置壁纸时，“捏合裁剪”等说明会暂时显示然后消失，而不是一直显示。

![iOS 26.1 壁纸裁剪](https://images.macrumors.com/t/tfCUacTQHa_O1SIlJJsFOpNse8c=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-wallpaper-crop.jpg?lossy)

### 显示辅助功能

*   **“显示边框”：** 在“辅助功能”设置的“显示与文字大小”部分，新增了“显示边框”开关。
*   **功能替代：** 此功能会为所有按钮添加边框，并取代了之前的“按钮形状”设置。

### 日历应用

*   **功能移除：** iOS 26.1 Beta 1 中显示带有全彩背景事件的日历应用更改已被移除。

### 照片应用

*   **多选管理界面：** 管理多张已选照片的界面进行了细微调整。
*   **菜单项顺序：** “播放幻灯片”、“收藏”和“隐藏”现在位于菜单顶部。

![iOS 26.1 照片应用](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vu0px3ce6jRWQ_C9VbJW3vOw9Zc=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-photos-app.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iOS 26.1 Beta 2 和 iPadOS 26.1 Beta 2 带来了多项更新。主要亮点包括：闹钟和计时器新增“滑动停止”功能，提升防误触体验；“设置”中加入自动安全更新开关；健身应用支持自定义锻炼；设置应用和主屏幕文件夹的文本对齐方式改为左对齐；iPadOS 26.1 重新引入 Slide Over 多任务功能；iPad 外接麦克风可调节输入增益；Liquid Glass 设计效果更微妙；照片应用多选管理界面优化。
items.translated_title: iOS 26.1 Beta 2 中的所有新功能
items.content:
Apple released the second beta of iOS 26.1 and iPadOS 26.1, introducing useful changes to alarms, multitasking on the iPad, and more. There are also subtle tweaks to some of the Liquid Glass design elements as Apple continues to refine iOS 26.


Alarms and Timers


Alarms set using the Clock app now have a slide to stop button rather than a tap to stop button on the Lock Screen. To snooze an alarm, you can tap, but to turn it off from the Lock Screen, you need to use a slide gesture.


The change makes it much harder to dismiss an alarm when you're trying to tap on the snooze button. Slide to Stop is also used for timers.

Background Security Improvements


The Privacy and Security section of the Settings app now has a toggle to automatically download and install security improvements. It's a revamp of the prior Rapid Security Responses feature.



Fitness App


You can now create custom workouts in the Fitness app on iPhone. There are options for selecting workout type, estimated Active Calories, effort, duration, and start time.


Settings App


Apple changed the alignment of icons and text in the Settings app. All settings with headers that feature text now have that text aligned to the left instead of center aligned.


This includes General, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Cellular, Personal Hotspot, Accessibility, and more.

Display Settings


The Display section of the Settings app now has iOS 26-themed wallpaper instead of iOS 18 wallpaper.


Home Screen Folders


When you tap into a folder on the Home Screen, the name of the folder at the top is left aligned instead of center aligned.


iPadOS 26.1 Slide Over


With iPadOS 26.1 beta 2, Apple reintroduced Slide Over. Slide Over works alongside the window-based iPadOS 26 multitasking functionality, so you can have multiple windows open and still swipe over to quickly access a Slide Over app.


You can only have one Slide Over app at a time in iPadOS 26.1, and you can use the feature by tapping on the green window resizing button and
toggling on Enter Slide Over.

External Microphones on iPad


There's now an option to adjust input gain on the ‌iPad‌ when using an external microphone.

Liquid Glass


The light refraction effect around apps is now more subtle with darker icon colors and background colors.

Wallpaper


When setting a wallpaper on the Lock Screen, instructions like Pinch to Crop show up momentarily and then disappear, rather than being shown all the time.


Display Accessibility


Under the Display and Text Size section in the Accessibility settings, there is a new "Display Borders" toggle. It adds a border to all buttons, and replaces the prior "Button Shapes" setting.

Calendar


The Calendar app change that showed events with a full color background in iOS 26.1 beta 1 has been removed.

Photos App


The interface for managing multiple photos that you've selected has been tweaked slightly. Play as Slideshow, Favorite, and Hide are now at the top of the menu.


More Features


Know of something new in iOS 26.1 that we missed? Let us know in the comments below.
Related Roundups: iOS 26, iPadOS 26

items.title: M5 MacBook Pro 可能于 10 月发布，M4 型号面临供应限制 (原标题: M5 MacBook Pro Could Launch in October as M4 Model Faces Supply Constraints)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# M5 MacBook Pro 可能于 10 月发布，M4 型号面临供应限制

## 概述
根据彭博社 Mark Gurman 的报道，由于 14 英寸 M4 MacBook Pro 型号的供应受限，有传言称升级版 M5 型号最早可能在 2025 年 10 月推出。这表明 Apple 可能正在为即将到来的新产品发布做准备。

![粉色 MacBook Pro](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Hx4TuUbk1KawkfZ2oLcsJgu6djw=/400x0/article-new/2025/03/macbook-pro-pink.jpeg?lossy)

## 供应受限的迹象
*   **发货延迟：** 14 英寸 M4 MacBook Pro 定制配置的发货日期已推迟至 10 月 23 日至 28 日，且没有加急送货选项。
*   **对比：** 搭载 M4 Pro 和 M4 Max 芯片的 14 英寸和 16 英寸 MacBook Pro 定制配置则有更标准的送货日期（10 月 15 日至 20 日），并提供加急送货。
*   **潜在含义：** 这种供应限制可能预示着 Apple 计划在 10 月份推出新的 M5 型号，尤其针对 14 英寸机型。

## 分阶段发布的可能性
Apple 可能采取分阶段发布策略：
1.  **10 月发布：** 率先推出搭载 M5 芯片的 14 英寸 MacBook Pro。
2.  **2026 年初发布：** 搭载更高端 M5 Pro 和 M5 Max 芯片的 14 英寸和 16 英寸 MacBook Pro 型号可能推迟到 2026 年初。
3.  **FCC 泄露：** 最近 FCC 泄露的文件中只包含一个 MacBook Pro 型号，这与分阶段发布 M5、M5 Pro 和 M5 Max MacBook Pro 的策略相符。

## 发布时间表的预测变化
关于 M5 MacBook Pro 的发布传闻一直存在混淆，这可能也印证了分阶段发布的可能性：
*   **Gurman 的预测：**
    *   2025 年初：M5 MacBook Pro 型号将在年底前推出。
    *   2025 年 7 月：Apple 计划将新 MacBook Pro 型号推迟到 2026 年初发布。
    *   2025 年 9 月末：新 MacBook Pro 型号将在 2025 年底至 2026 年初之间发布。
*   **Ming-Chi Kuo 的观点：** 2025 年 8 月，分析师郭明錤表示，高端 M5 芯片要到 2026 年才会引入 MacBook Pro，但他没有提及基础 M5 芯片。

## 对 OLED MacBook Pro 传闻的影响
如果 Apple 在 10 月推出 M5 MacBook Pro，并在 2026 年春季推出 M5 Pro 和 M5 Max 型号，这可能会对 2026 年 OLED MacBook Pro 的传闻产生影响：
*   **推迟可能性：** 过去几年有传闻称 Apple 将在 2026 年底推出升级版 OLED MacBook Pro。一年内进行两次 MacBook Pro 更新并不常见（尽管有先例，如 2023 年 1 月的 M2 Pro/Max 和 10 月的 M3 Pro/Max），因此 OLED 型号可能推迟到 2027 年。

## 可能的发布情景
文章列出了几种可能的发布情景：
1.  **情景一：** 10 月发布 14 英寸 M5 MacBook Pro；M5 Pro 和 M5 Max 型号在春季发布；2026 年不发布 OLED MacBook Pro。
2.  **情景二：** 10 月发布 14 英寸 M5 MacBook Pro；M5 Pro 和 M5 Max 型号在春季发布；OLED MacBook Pro 型号在秋季发布（一年内两次 MacBook 发布）。
3.  **情景三：** 10 月仅发布 14 英寸 M5 MacBook Pro；M5 Pro 和 M5 Max 型号推迟到 2026 年底，并用于 OLED MacBook Pro。
4.  **情景四：** 10 月发布 M5、M5 Pro 和 M5 Max MacBook Pro 型号；M6 MacBook Pro 型号按传闻在 2026 年底发布。

## Mac 发布的不确定性
*   **难以预测：** Mac 产品的发布时间通常比 iPhone 更难确定，因为制造数量较少，且外壳制造商等对设计细节的兴趣也较低。
*   **无固定周期：** Apple 没有固定的 Mac 更新时间，每年都有所不同。

## 发布活动与形式
*   **活动可能性：** 目前尚不清楚 10 月是否会有发布活动。M5 芯片作为主要芯片（M1、M2、M3、M4）通常在活动中发布，而“升级”芯片（如 M2 Pro/Max）有时通过新闻稿发布。M5 可能是第一个通过新闻稿发布的主要芯片，或者 Apple 可能会举行类似 2023 年“Scary Fast”的短活动。
*   **其他 M5 设备：** M5 芯片预计也将用于 iPad Pro 和 Vision Pro，此外还有传闻称 Apple 可能更新 Apple TV 和 HomePod mini。
*   **更新性质：** 预计这些设备更新主要为性能提升（“spec bumps”），而非设计改变，这种情况下 Apple 通常会通过新闻稿进行发布。
items.shortSummary: M4 MacBook Pro 14 英寸型号供应受限，预示 M5 MacBook Pro 可能在 2025 年 10 月发布。Apple 或将采取分阶段发布策略，先推出 14 英寸 M5 型号，而 M5 Pro/Max 型号可能推迟到 2026 年初。这可能影响 OLED MacBook Pro 在 2026 年发布的传闻。M5 芯片预计也将用于 iPad Pro 等其他 Apple 设备。此次更新可能主要为性能提升，发布形式或为新闻稿或小型活动。
items.translated_title: M5 MacBook Pro 可能于 10 月发布，M4 型号面临供应限制
items.content:
Supplies of the 14-inch M4 MacBook Pro model appear to be constrained amid rumors that an upgraded M5 model could launch as soon as this year.


As noted by Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, custom configurations of the ‌M4 MacBook Pro‌ model have a delayed shipping date and will not be delivered to customers until October 23 to 28. The restricted supply could be an indication that Apple is planning to launch a new M5 model at some point in October.

Custom configurations of 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models with M4 Pro and M4 Max chips have more standard delivery dates ranging from October 15 to October 20 with express delivery available. Custom configurations of the 14-inch ‌MacBook Pro‌ have a notable delay in comparison, with no express shipping option.

It is possible that Apple is planning to refresh the 14-inch ‌MacBook Pro‌ with an M5 chip, while waiting until early 2026 to introduce 14-inch and 16-inch ‌MacBook Pro‌ models with higher-end M5 Pro and M5 Max chips.

Last week, the FCC leaked several upcoming devices, including a single MacBook Pro model. The leak was unusual because the FCC only included a single ‌MacBook Pro‌ model number, but usually there are multiple model numbers for different size and chip options.

The single model listed in the FCC's documents makes sense if Apple is splitting up the M5, M5 Pro, and M5 Max ‌MacBook Pro‌ launches.

Rumors about the M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌ have been confusing this year, which could be explained by a staggered launch. At the beginning of 2025, Gurman said that M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌ models would come out before the end of the year. In July 2025, Gurman said that Apple instead planned to launch new ‌MacBook Pro‌ models in early 2026, having decided to push back their debut. Just last weekend, Gurman changed his prediction and said that new ‌MacBook Pro‌ models would be released at some point between late 2025 and early 2026.

In August, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggested that high-end M5 chips would not be introduced in ‌MacBook Pro‌ models until 2026, but he didn't mention the base M5 chip.

If Apple introduces the M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌ in October and then waits until spring 2026 to introduce ‌MacBook Pro‌ models with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips, it might not be good news for those 2026 OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ rumors. For the last couple of years, rumors have suggested that Apple will introduce an upgraded OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ in late 2026. It is unusual to have two ‌MacBook Pro‌ refreshes in a single year, but not unheard of. The ‌MacBook Pro‌ was updated with M2 Pro and ‌M2‌ Max chips in January 2023, and then M3 Pro and M3 Max chips in October 2023.

An early 2026 launch for the M5 Pro and M5 Max ‌MacBook Pro‌ models could mean that the OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ models aren't coming in 2026 after all, with Apple to hold them until 2027. Of course, it's also possible that the FCC's documents were incomplete, and Apple does have plans to introduce the M5, M5 Pro, and M5 Max all at the same time. Here are the scenarios we could see:

  • Apple launches the 14-inch M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌ in October. M5 Pro and M5 Max models come out in the spring. No OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ launches in 2026.

  • Apple launches the 14-inch M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌ in October. M5 Pro and M5 Max models come out in the spring. OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ models follow in the fall, with two MacBook launches in a single year.

  • Apple launches just the 14-inch M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌ in October. M5 Pro and M5 Max models are held until late 2026 and are used in the OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌.

  • Apple launches the M5, M5 Pro, and M5 Max ‌MacBook Pro‌ models in October. M6 ‌MacBook Pro‌ models follow in late 2026 as rumored.


It's not unusual for Mac timing to be a little harder to pin down than iPhone timing because there are fewer machines being manufactured and less interest in design details from case makers and other parties. Apple also doesn't have a set time of the year for Mac refreshes, and there is variation from year to year.

At this point, it's unclear if we're going to get an October event. We're also expecting the M5 chip to come to the iPad Pro and the Vision Pro, plus rumors suggest Apple could update the Apple TV and the HomePod mini. If the M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌ launches, that's five new devices in the fall 2025 timeframe, but unfortunately, it's all just spec bumps. It doesn't look like any of the devices that are going to be refreshed in the coming months will have design changes, and in that situation, Apple often does launches with press releases.

The M5 chip confuses the situation. All of the next-number M-series chip upgrades have been announced at events, not through press releases. Apple unveiled the M1, ‌M2‌, M3, and M4 at events. Some of the "upgrade" chips were introduced with a press release, like the ‌M2‌ Pro and ‌M2‌ Max, but never a main chip.

The M5 chip could be the first that Apple announces with a press release, or we could get a short October event like the 2023 "Scary Fast" Mac event. The October 2023 event included the M3, M3 Pro, and M3 Max chips in the ‌MacBook Pro‌ and iMac, and neither Mac got design updates.

items.title: 更多苹果应用获得液态玻璃重新设计 (原标题: More Apple Apps Get Liquid Glass Redesign)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果应用获得“液态玻璃”重新设计

2025年10月6日，苹果公司更新了其TestFlight和Apple Support应用，为它们引入了“液态玻璃”设计，使其与iOS 26的其他部分保持一致。

## “液态玻璃”设计特点
新的“液态玻璃”界面元素带来了统一且现代的外观，主要特点包括：
*   **圆润按钮：** 界面中的按钮变得更加圆润。
*   **浮动导航栏：** 引入了视觉上更具动感的浮动导航栏。
*   **半透明效果：** 在某些区域增加了半透明效果，提升了界面的层次感。
*   **应用图标：** 应用图标也采用了“液态玻璃”风格，看起来像是多层玻璃堆叠在一起。

## TestFlight 应用更新
TestFlight是一款允许iPhone用户下载开发者测试版应用进行测试的工具。此次更新中，TestFlight获得了显著改进：
*   **图标重塑：** 应用图标进行了全面改造，简化了螺旋桨设计，以更好地适应“液态玻璃”风格。
*   **辅助功能：** 增加了多项辅助功能改进，包括VoiceOver（旁白）、Voice Control（语音控制）和Larger Text（更大文本），提升了应用的可访问性。
*   **测试者匹配：** 似乎还包含了一项新的“测试者匹配”功能，可以根据用户的兴趣帮助他们发现可能喜欢尝试的测试版应用。

![TestFlight 液态玻璃设计](https://images.macrumors.com/t/2ZvbDw11axXYUmP72AOK0SM311E=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/testflight-liquid-glass.jpg?lossy)

## Apple Support 应用更新
Apple Support是苹果公司专门为用户提供设备帮助和支持的官方应用。它也获得了“液态玻璃”设计更新，与TestFlight和iOS 26的整体风格保持一致。

![Apple Support 液态玻璃设计](https://images.macrumors.com/t/39vlgGl6HBFs42ItQcKUKllsWCs=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/apple-support-app-liquid-glass.jpg?lossy)

## 总结
这两款应用均可免费下载。此次更新旨在通过统一的“液态玻璃”设计，为用户提供更加一致和现代化的iOS 26体验。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已更新TestFlight和Apple Support应用，引入了与iOS 26一致的“液态玻璃”设计。新设计特点包括更圆润的按钮、浮动导航栏、半透明效果及多层玻璃堆叠的图标。TestFlight还新增了辅助功能改进和“测试者匹配”功能。这些更新旨在统一用户体验，两款应用均可免费下载。
items.translated_title: 更多苹果应用获得液态玻璃重新设计

Apple today updated its TestFlight and Apple Support apps, adding Liquid Glass designs to match the rest of iOS 26.


Both apps now feature Liquid Glass interface elements, such as more rounded buttons, floating navigation bars, and translucency in some areas. They also feature Liquid Glass app icons that look like multiple layers of glass stacked on one another.

TestFlight got an icon overhaul, and the new design features simplified propellers that work better with the Liquid Glass look.

TestFlight is an app that allows iPhone users to download beta apps from developers for testing purposes. Apple says that TestFlight also includes Accessibility improvements, including VoiceOver, Voice Control, and Larger Text.


TestFlight also appears to include a new Tester Matching feature that helps users discover apps they might like to try based on their interest.

Apple Support is Apple's dedicated app for getting help with your devices.

items.title: 苹果在 iOS 26.1 中修复了闹钟问题 (原标题: Apple Fixes Alarms in iOS 26.1)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iOS 26.1 中闹钟功能更新

苹果在 iOS 26.1 的第二个测试版中对 iPhone 闹钟的关闭方式进行了重要更新，旨在解决用户在睡意朦胧中误关闹钟的问题。

### 主要变化

*   **新的关闭手势**：在 iOS 26.1 beta 2 中，完全关闭闹钟不再是简单的点击，而是需要使用新的“滑动停止”（Slide to Stop）手势。
*   **贪睡功能不变**：用户仍然可以通过点击来选择“贪睡”闹钟。

### 更新目的与背景

*   **防止误触**：此项改变旨在帮助那些在半睡半醒状态下，容易将“停止”按钮误触为“贪睡”按钮的用户。
*   **解决 iOS 26 问题**：在当前 iOS 26 版本中，由于“贪睡”和“停止”按钮较大且靠近，用户很容易不小心完全禁用闹钟。新的“滑动停止”手势能有效防止用户在早上盲目点击时完全关闭闹钟。
*   **设计延续**：新的“滑动停止”按钮与“贪睡”和“停止”按钮保持相同的大小，表明苹果在解决功能问题的同时，保留了其在 iOS 26 中更新的设计。

### 其他应用

*   **计时器功能**：“滑动停止”手势也应用于 iOS 26.1 beta 2 中的计时器功能。

### 视觉参考

![iOS 26.1 滑动停止闹钟](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JjK3uoWLl9BJuErwKxwehRzIjzw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-slide-to-stop.jpg?lossy)

上图展示了 iOS 26.1 beta 2 中新的“滑动停止”闹钟界面。
items.shortSummary: 苹果在 iOS 26.1 beta 2 中更新了 iPhone 闹钟的关闭方式，引入了新的“滑动停止”手势，取代了原有的点击关闭。此举旨在防止用户在睡意中误触“停止”而非“贪睡”闹钟。贪睡功能仍可通过点击实现。这一改动也适用于计时器，旨在提升用户体验，避免意外禁用闹钟。
items.translated_title: 苹果在 iOS 26.1 中修复了闹钟问题
items.content:
With the second beta of iOS 26.1, Apple updated the design of alarms set on the iPhone, making them harder to dismiss than before.


Stopping an alarm in iOS 26.1 beta 2 requires a new Slide to Stop gesture rather than a simple tap. You can continue to tap to snooze an alarm, but if you want to turn it off entirely, you need to use a swipe.

Transitioning from a tap to a slide gesture to stop an alarm could potentially help people who sleepily dismiss an alarm without meaning to. It's easy to accidentally tap Stop instead of Snooze in the current version of iOS 26, but now if you blindly tap at your ‌iPhone‌ in the morning, you won't be able to disable your alarm entirely.

The new Slide to Stop button is still as large as the Snooze and Stop buttons, so Apple keeps its updated design, while solving the problem that it introduced. In iOS 18, the Snooze and Stop buttons were much smaller and had a significant degree of separation, so it was difficult to hit stop when you meant to hit snooze.

Slide to Stop is also used for timers in iOS 26.1 beta 2.

items.title: iPadOS 26.1 Beta 2 重新引入 Slide Over 多任务处理 (原标题: iPadOS 26.1 Beta 2 Reintroduces Slide Over Multitasking)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iPadOS 26.1 Beta 2 重新引入 Slide Over 多任务处理

苹果在 iPadOS 26.1 的第二个测试版中，重新引入了备受用户怀念的 Slide Over 多任务处理功能。该功能曾在 iPadOS 26 中被移除，取而代之的是一套新的窗口化多任务处理系统，但部分 iPad 用户对此功能的需求依然强烈。

## Slide Over 功能概述

重新设计的 Slide Over 版本能够与 iPadOS 26 的所有新多任务处理功能协同工作。它允许用户在打开多个应用窗口的同时，快速调出一个应用以浮窗形式叠加在这些窗口化应用之上。

![iPadOS 26 设计](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0O-FXsF3rBqDjSdp9SmSWKv0xmA=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ipados-26-design.jpg?lossy)

## 如何使用 Slide Over

要在 iPadOS 26.1 中使用 Slide Over，用户需要遵循以下步骤：

1.  点击应用窗口上的绿色图标，以打开窗口大小控制选项。
2.  从弹出的控制菜单中，点击“进入 Slide Over”（Enter Slide Over）按钮。

![iPadOS 26.1 Slide Over](https://images.macrumors.com/t/81VOK8kMc_rZGvoseq4jpcJv7Aw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ipados-26-1-slide-over.jpg?lossy)

## Slide Over 的行为与新特性

当一个应用被置于 Slide Over 模式时，它会转换为一个浮动窗口，并始终保持在其他已打开应用之上。用户可以通过滑动操作来隐藏或重新显示这个 Slide Over 应用。值得注意的是，在 iPadOS 26.1 中，Slide Over 窗口现在可以根据需要进行大小调整，这是一项新功能。

## 限制

目前，iPadOS 26.1 Beta 2 中的 Slide Over 功能仅支持单个应用，这与旧版 Slide Over 的多应用支持有所不同。尽管如此，对于那些一直期待此功能回归的用户来说，这仍然是一个受欢迎的补充。
items.shortSummary: iPadOS 26.1 Beta 2 重新引入了此前在 iPadOS 26 中移除的 Slide Over 多任务处理功能。该功能允许用户将一个应用以可调整大小的浮窗形式叠加在其他窗口化应用之上。用户可通过点击应用窗口图标并选择“进入 Slide Over”来激活。虽然目前仅支持单个应用，但它满足了部分用户对该功能的需求，并与新的多任务处理系统兼容。
items.translated_title: iPadOS 26.1 Beta 2 重新引入 Slide Over 多任务处理
items.content:
With the second beta of iPadOS 26.1, Apple tweaked multitasking on the iPad to reintroduce the Slide Over feature. Slide Over was removed in iPadOS 26 because Apple replaced it with a new windowed multitasking system, but some ‌iPad‌ users missed the feature.


The updated version of Slide Over works with all of the new ‌iPadOS 26‌ multitasking features. You can have multiple app windows open, and then use Slide Over to quickly get to an app that overlays your windowed apps.

To use Slide Over in iPadOS 26.1, you'll need to tap on the green icon of an app's window to open up the window sizing controls. From there, you can tap on the "Enter Slide Over" button.


When an app has been put into Slide Over mode, it transitions into a Slide Over window that stays over your other open apps. You can swipe to hide the Slide Over app from view, and then swipe to bring it back again. The Slide Over window can be resized as needed, which is new in iPadOS 26.1.

Slide Over in iPadOS 26.1 beta 2 supports a single app, so it's not quite the same as the older version of Slide Over, but it should be a welcome addition to those who were missing the option.

items.title: 苹果发布 iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1、macOS Tahoe 26.1 等系统的第二个测试版 (原标题: Apple Seeds Second Betas of iOS 26.1, iPadOS 26.1, macOS Tahoe 26.1 and More)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果发布 iOS 26.1 等系统第二个测试版

2025年10月6日，苹果向开发者发布了即将推出的 iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1、macOS Tahoe 26.1、tvOS 26.1、watchOS 26.1 和 visionOS 26.1 更新的第二个测试版，用于测试目的。这些第二个测试版是在苹果发布第一个测试版两周后推出的。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### 主要更新内容

开发者可以通过兼容设备上的“设置”应用，进入“通用”>“软件更新”来下载新的测试版。此次更新带来了多项功能改进和扩展：

*   **Apple Intelligence 语言扩展**：现已支持更多语言，包括丹麦语、荷兰语、挪威语、葡萄牙语（葡萄牙）、瑞典语、土耳其语、繁体中文和越南语。
*   **AirPods 实时翻译**：在 iOS 26.1 中，AirPods 实时翻译功能新增支持日语、韩语、意大利语以及中文（包括普通话繁体和简体）。
*   **Liquid Glass 扩展**：该功能已扩展到电话应用的键盘。
*   **Apple Music 新手势**：新增了用于切换曲目的滑动操作。
*   **视觉变化**：日历、Safari 和照片应用界面进行了视觉调整。
*   **闹钟改进 (iOS 26.1 beta 2)**：苹果更新了 iPhone 闹钟的设计，使其更难被解除。现在，停止闹钟需要使用新的“滑动停止”手势，而不是简单的点按。点按仍然可以用于小睡闹钟，但要完全关闭闹钟则需要滑动。

iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1、macOS Tahoe 26.1、tvOS 26.1、watchOS 26.1 和 visionOS 26.1 的最终版本预计将于十月晚些时候发布。

### 其他相关新闻

文章还提及了其他一些热门新闻和预测：

*   **iOS 26.1 至 26.4 的未来功能**：iOS 26.1 已在 Apple Intelligence 和 AirPods 实时翻译中增加了更多语言支持，并对 Apple Music、日历、照片和 Safari 进行了一些小幅更改。未来的版本预计将带来更多功能和变化。
*   **苹果领导层重大调整**：据彭博社的马克·古尔曼报道，苹果正经历十多年来最重要的领导层过渡，多位高级管理人员准备离职，CEO 蒂姆·库克开始塑造公司的下一代领导团队。杰夫·威廉姆斯曾被视为库克的潜在继任者。
*   **新款 iPhone 需求强劲**：iPhone 17 系列发布近两周后，摩根士丹利分析师表示，基于苹果在线商店的延长发货预估以及从供应链收集的信息，设备需求“略强于我们最初的预期”。iPhone 17 和 iPhone 17 Pro 的早期需求强劲。
*   **iOS 26 新增功能**：上个月发布的 iOS 26 软件更新包含了近 200 项新功能和更改（可在苹果网站找到 PDF 文件）。iOS 26 兼容 iPhone 11 及更新机型，并提供了 iPadOS 26 和 macOS Tahoe 的相应列表。
*   **M5 MacBook Air 预测**：作为苹果最受欢迎的笔记本电脑，M5 MacBook Air 的发布日期、功能和性能预测已成为关注焦点，预计将基于苹果的芯片路线图带来显著提升。
*   **iCloud 存储优势**：在推出新款 iPhone 后，苹果在其主页上显著推广 iCloud+，以期提高服务收入。除了更多存储空间外，所有 iCloud+ 计划都为 iPhone 用户提供五项额外福利。iCloud 免费提供 5GB 存储空间，额外存储需订阅 iCloud+ 计划。
*   **iPad Mini 8 即将推出**：据马克·古尔曼透露，新款 iPad mini“绝对”在开发中。作为 iPad mini 7 的继任者，预计将搭载 A19 Pro 芯片。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已向开发者发布了 iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1、macOS Tahoe 26.1 等多个操作系统的第二个测试版。此次更新主要扩展了 Apple Intelligence 和 AirPods 实时翻译的语言支持，并对电话应用、Apple Music、日历、Safari 和照片进行了功能及视觉改进。iOS 26.1 beta 2 还引入了新的“滑动停止”手势来解除闹钟。最终版本预计将于十月晚些时候发布。文章还提及了苹果领导层变动、iPhone 17 需求强劲及未来产品预测等相关新闻。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布 iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1、macOS Tahoe 26.1 等系统的第二个测试版
items.content:
Apple today provided developers with the second betas of upcoming iOS 26.1, iPadOS 26.1, macOS Tahoe 26.1, tvOS 26.1, watchOS 26.1, and visionOS 26.1 updates for testing purposes. The second betas come two weeks after Apple released the first betas.


The new betas can be downloaded from the Settings app on a compatible device by going to General > Software Update.

Apple Intelligence is now available in more languages in the updates, including Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese (Portugal), Swedish, Turkish, Chinese (Traditional), and Vietnamese. AirPods Live Translation also works with Japanese, Korean, Italian, and Chinese (both Mandarin Traditional and Simplified) in iOS 26.1.

Liquid Glass has been expanded to the Phone app's keypad, Apple Music has a new swipe gesture for changing tracks, and there are visual changes to Calendar, Safari, and Photos. Details on what we've found in iOS 26.1 so far can be found in our iOS 26.1 beta 1 feature list.

The iOS 26.1, iPadOS 26.1, macOS Tahoe 26.1, tvOS 26.1, watchOS 26.1, and visionOS 26.1, betas will be released later in October.
